subsections.description: Located between the church and the bedrooms.

pic.alt: Power switch location

subsections.description: Interact with all 3 locations to enable PaP. Machine will move randomly between the locations.

pic.alt: Location 1 (Bastion) - next to the Death Ray
Location 2 (Undercroft) - in the Undercroft between Juggernog and the teleporter
Location 3 (Rocket Pad) - up the stairs at the rocket
Finished Pack-a-Punch machine

subsections.description: Stand on each of the 4 pressure plates surrounding the pyramid until they light up blue. Once active, low gravity mode will randomly turn on and off during the game.

pic.alt: Pyramid and surrounding pressure plates

subsections.description: Each of the 4 Wunderspheres requires its landing pad to be activated once during the match. This does not require power.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in spawn, used for the rocket Wundersphere
Location 2 - above Double Tap, used for the courtyard Wundersphere
Location 3 - just outside the clock tower, used for the Double Tap Wundersphere
Location 4 - outside the rocket blast doors, used for the Death Ray Wundersphere

subsections.description: A tram fuse can be spent in spawn to get a random power-up.

pic.alt: Tram fuse power-up
Tram fuse control location

subsections.description: Enter the blue room in the Undercroft to fly up through the well and into the courtyard.

pic.alt: Entrance to well
Quick Revive - upstairs in spawn
Double Tap Root Beer - through the bottom floor door in spawn
Mule Kick - in the cave between spawn and the church courtyard
Speed Cola - in the church
Stamin-Up - in the power room
Juggernog - between spawn and the Undercroft
Der Wunderfizz location 1 - by the Double Tap dragon
Der Wunderfizz location 2 - in the bedrooms
Der Wunderfizz location 3 - outside the clock tower
Der Wunderfizz location 4 - in the church
Der Wunderfizz location 5 - by the rocket
Location 1 - in the Undercroft
Location 2 - in the church
Location 3 - above Double Tap

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and craft at a workbench.

subsections.description: Located in the Undercroft (3 possible locations). Low gravity mode required.

pic.alt: Location 1 - on the metal frame surrounding the pyramid, above the workbench
Location 2 - above the door that leads to the teleporter
Location 3 - on the wall above Pack-a-Punch

subsections.description: Located around courtyard outside of Speed Cola room (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the bell tower on the floor
Location 2 - at the base of the stairs that lead to the Death Ray
Location 3 - to the right of the doors that lead to Speed Cola

subsections.description: Located near Double Tap (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on some boxes near a barricade
Location 2 - at the bottom of some short stairs leading to a barricade
Location 3 - up the stairs towards the Death Ray

subsections.description: Build at one of the 3 workbenches. Each player can equip the shield.

pic.alt: One possible build location, in the Undercroft

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and craft at a workbench.

subsections.description: Wait by the rocket until test launch starts. After the test starts, interact with the lever under the rocket. Then wait behind the blast doors until the test is over, and a control panel will light up green. Interact with the panel, then pick up the part inside the teleporter.

pic.alt: The lever to start the process
The control panel to interact with
The part in the teleporter

subsections.description: Spawns in the sky after using the Death Ray trap (spawns in 1 of 2 possible locations). Pick up by using the correct Wundersphere, either in the courtyard or above Double Tap.

pic.alt: Death Ray
Location 1 - in the path of the courtyard Wundersphere
Location 2 - in the path of the Wundersphere above Double Tap

subsections.description: Dropped when killing a Panzer

pic.alt: Part over a dead Panzer

subsections.description: Build at one of the 3 workbenches. Each player can equip the Ragnaroks.

pic.alt: One possible build location, in the Speed Cola room

sections.description: Feed 8 zombies to each of the 3 dragon heads.

subsections.description: After each kill, wait for the dragon animation to finish before killing the next zombie. When done, the dragon head will be destroyed.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the Undercroft by the pyramid
Location 2 - near Double Tap, by the stairs that lead to the Undercroft
Location 3 - in the church near Speed Cola

subsections.description: Interact with the bow down the stairs from Speed Cola. This will replace your active weapon like a wall-buy.

pic.alt: Bow spawn location

sections.description: Bows are upgraded separately and can be done in any order.

step.title: 1. Acquire storm arrow
step.description: Using a bow, shoot the weathervane located between the Death Ray and clock tower (aim below the dragon). Then pick up the arrow that drops. Only the player who holds the arrow can complete the remaining steps.

pic.alt: Weathervane

step.title: 2. Ignite 3 fires
step.description: Using a bow, shoot the 3 wood piles outside the map. They will ignite when hit correctly.

pic.alt: Location 1 - behind the clock tower
Where to aim for location 1
Location 2 - out the spawn door that goes towards Double Tap
Where to aim for location 2, match the height by where the spotlights switch directions
Location 3 - at the rocket
Where to aim for location 3, a shortcut from above Double Tap. Keep the crosshair just left of the pine tree, and the left crosshair about as high as where the 2 mountains cross

step.title: 3. Wallrun over the symbols
step.description: In the Undercroft, wallrun over the 5 blinking symbols without touching the ground. When finished, they will stay lit up.

pic.alt: One of the blinking symbols on the wall

step.title: 4. Get kills by the 3 sparking urns
step.description: Using a bow, kill zombies near the 3 sparking urns. When zombie souls no longer go to the urn, it is done.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the clock tower
Location 2 - above Double Tap
Location 3 - at the rocket site, inside the blast doors

step.title: 5. Electrify the 3 fires
step.description: Pull an arrow next to each of the urns, then shoot the sparking arrow into the nearest fire from step 2. The fire will have lightning around it when complete.

pic.alt: Where to aim for bell tower location
Where to aim for Double Tap location
Where to aim for rocket location
Fire with lightning around it

step.title: 6. Interact with the blue smoke and pick up the arrow
step.description: Go back to where the arrow was in step 1. Interact with the smoke, then interact with the arrow.

pic.alt: Blue smoke location

step.title: 7. Get kills by the pyramid
step.description: Place the arrow in the storm box next to the pyramid. Then, kill zombies next to the pyramid until no more souls fly towards the arrow (kills must be using a bow).

pic.alt: Storm box

step.title: 8. Aquire the upgraded bow
step.description: Place the original bow in the storm box, then grab the upgraded bow.

pic.alt: Finished bow

subsections.header: Fire Bow (Rune Prison / Kreeaho'ahm nal Ahmhogaroc)

step.title: 1. Aquire rune prison arrow
step.description: Using a bow, shoot the red symbol in the upstairs of the clock tower. Then, pick up the arrow. Only the player who holds the arrow can complete the remaining steps.

pic.alt: Red symbol location

step.title: 2. Shoot the flaming rock after a rocket test launch
step.description: Immediately after a test launch finishes, shoot the glowing red rock just outside the blast doors (using a bow). Aim towards the upper left corner of the glowing rock, and shoot one arrow. When done, a flaming orb will shoot out of the rock and float above the Death Ray.

pic.alt: Glowing rock out the blast doors and to the right
Flaming orb shooting towards the Death Ray
Shortcut location to aim from spawn to hit glowing rock

step.title: 3. Ignite the 3 circles
step.description: While flying from a Wundersphere, hit an arrow in each of the 3 fire circles. When a circle is hit, it will remain lit up.

pic.alt: Location 1 - between spawn and Double Tap
Location 2 - outside the clock tower
Location 3 - by the Death Ray
Shortcut location to aim from Death Ray Wundersphere to hit circle by Double Tap. Place left and right crosshairs over the two clouds, and shoot without charging the bow

step.title: 4. Charge the 3 circles with kills
step.description: Stand in each of the 3 circles and get zombie kills with a bow until a red light shoots up from the ground. The circle will dim after enough kills.

pic.alt: Finished circle

step.title: 5. Interact with the clock tower gears
step.description: Go back to where you got the arrow and interact with the gears behind the wall. Afterwards, only 1 of the circles will remain lit up.

pic.alt: Clock tower gears

step.title: 6. Pass fire from the circle to the corresponding fireplace
step.description: Stand in the lit up circle and shoot an arrow towards the correct fireplace. Then, stand on the flaming rock pile and shoot again. Repeat until the fireplace lights up. If the rock pile vanishes, go back to the circle and try again.

pic.alt: Fireplace by the Double Tap dragon. Used for the circle outside the clock tower.
Fireplace in the church. Used for the circle by the Death Ray.
Fireplace in the bedrooms area. Used for the circle on the way from spawn to Double Tap.
Flaming rock pile
Lit fireplace

step.title: 7. Interact with the fireplace, then interact with the flaming orb and pick up the arrow
step.description: Interact with the smoke in the fireplace so it vanishes. Then, go to the Death Ray and interact with the flaming orb so it explodes and drops the arrow. Pick up the arrow.

pic.alt: Flaming orb by the Death Ray

step.title: 8. Get kills by the pyramid
step.description: Place the arrow in the rune prison box next to the pyramid. Then, kill zombies next to the pyramid until no more souls fly towards the arrow (kills must be using a bow).

pic.alt: Rune prison box

step.title: 9. Aquire the upgraded bow
step.description: Place the original bow in the rune prison box, then grab the upgraded bow.

pic.alt: Finished bow

subsections.header: Wolf Bow (Wolf Howl / Kreeholo lu Kreemasaleet)

step.title: 1. Interact with the 4 paintings
step.description: Four paintings must be interacted in the correct order such that the wolf symbol remains lit up blue. The same 4 locations always have the paintings, but the order that the paintings are located is randomized. The painting order is what matters, not the location order.

pic.alt: First painting. On the way from the power room to the bedrooms.
Second painting. In the clock tower.
Third painting. In the room below the clock tower.
Fourth painting. Upstairs in the church.

step.title: 2. Aquire wolf howl arrow
step.description: Go to the Undercroft and interact with the arrow just below the stairs that lead to the first bow. Only the player who holds the arrow can complete the remaining steps.

pic.alt: Arrow location in the Undercroft

step.title: 3. Shoot the red flag and pick up the skull
step.description: Go to the rocket and shoot the red flag above and left of the blast doors (with a bow). Interact with the blue wolf skull that drops.

pic.alt: Red flag location high above the blast doors (not the red iron cross banner)
Wolf skull location

step.title: 4. Interact with the wolf howl box
step.description: Go to the pyramid and interact with the wolf howl box. Then, follow the wolf spirit.

pic.alt: Wolf howl box

step.title: 5. Get kills by the wolf
step.description: The wolf will stop in 3 locations. In each location, get bow kills until no more souls fly to the glowing blue spot in the ground. Interact with each of the blue spots so the wolf continues to the next.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the courtyard outside the church
Location 2 - near Double Tap, towards spawn
Location 3 - in the Undercroft by Pack-a-Punch

step.title: 6. Shoot the symbol and get the arrow
step.description: In the Undercroft, the wolf will stand under an opening in the wall. When low gravity is active, wall run towards the opening, then shoot the glowing symbol just above the opening with a bow. A platform will appear that you can stand on. Stand on the platform and interact on the hole to spawn a skeleton. Pick up the arrow from the skeleton's hand.

pic.alt: Glowing symbol above hole in wall
Where to interact to spawn the skeleton
The arrow in the skeleton's hand

step.title: 7. Get kills by the pyramid
step.description: Place the arrow in the wolf howl box next to the pyramid. Then, kill zombies next to the pyramid until no more souls fly towards the arrow (kills must be using a bow).

pic.alt: Wolf howl box

step.title: 8. Aquire the upgraded bow
step.description: Place the original bow in the wolf howl box, then grab the upgraded bow.

pic.alt: Finished bow

subsections.header: Void Bow (Demon Gate / Kreegakaleet lu Gosata'ahm)

step.title: 1. Aquire demon gate arrow
step.description: Using a bow, shoot the purple symbol above the door next to Double Tap. Then, pick up the arrow. Only the player who holds the arrow can complete the remaining steps.

pic.alt: Purple symbol location

step.title: 2. Melee a zombie over the purple square
step.description: Go to the room under the clock tower. There will be a glowing purple square in the middle. Get a melee kill with the bow on a zombie standing directly over the square, and a hole will open up.

pic.alt: Purple square under the clock tower
Hole in the floor after melee kill

step.title: 3. Interact with the glowing purple urn
step.description: When done, the urn will rise from the ground and stay floating in the room.

pic.alt: Floating urn

step.title: 4. Collect the 6 skulls
step.description: There are 6 skulls located around the map that must be interacted. They are always in the same spots, and will vanish after being interacted.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the tunnel by Mule Kick
Location 2 - sitting in a window outside the church, on the balcony
Location 3 - next to Double Tap
Location 4 - in a chest in the bedroom
Location 5 - in a sink in the teleporter room
Location 6 - in the back of a truck, down by the rocket

step.title: 5. Feed 6 crawling zombies to the skulls
step.description: All 6 skulls will now be floating above a circle in the room with the urn. Bring 6 crawling zombies into the circle, and a skull will kill each one. When done, all the skulls will be gone. Grenades can be used to create crawling zombies without killing them after a few rounds.

pic.alt: All 6 skulls floating above the circle

step.title: 6. Remember the 3 names in the correct order
step.description: A voice will say three names that must be remembered (in the same order as spoken). The three names will be picked from the following: Crown, Door, Griffin, Heart, Horn, and Stag. The voice will repeat the names if you shoot the floating urn with an arrow.

pic.alt: Location to shoot to repeat the names

step.title: 7. Decipher the symbols from the names
step.description: Go to the power room and find the 6 knights with a symbol beneath them. Interact with the 3 symbols that correspond to the names from before. Remember the 3 symbols in the same order as the names were spoken.

pic.alt: Crown knight
Door knight
Griffin knight
Heart knight
Horn knight
Stag knight

step.title: 8. Kill zombies and pick up the purple symbol power-ups
step.description: Until all 6 symbols are placed in the circles around the floating urn, zombies will randomly drop them as power-ups (only when killed by the player doing this quest).

pic.alt: One of the symbol drops
Circle with all symbols collected

step.title: 9. Shoot the 3 symbols in the circle, and pick up the arrow
step.description: Go back to the room beneath the clock tower. Use a bow to shoot the 3 symbols in the correct order. If done correctly, pick up the arrow that appears in the middle. If the symbols are wrong, you will take damage or be downed. Leave the room quickly to avoid taking damage.

pic.alt: 2 of the 3 symbols selected and floating in the room

step.title: 10. Get kills by the pyramid
step.description: Place the arrow in the demon gate box next to the pyramid. Then, kill zombies next to the pyramid until no more souls fly towards the arrow (kills must be using a bow).

pic.alt: Demon gate box

step.title: 11. Aquire the upgraded bow
step.description: Place the original bow in the demon gate box, then grab the upgraded bow.

pic.alt: Finished bow

subsections.description: It doesn't matter which one is done first, and only one player needs an upgraded bow for now

subsections.header: 2. Shoot All 6 Teleporter Spokes with the Starter Bow
subsections.description: Any player with a starter bow can do this step. If your bow is upgraded, set it back on the correct box, then pick up the starter bow. When shot, the spoke will change from glowing blue to orange. After all 6 are shot, they will all go back to blue and a sound will be heard.

pic.alt: 5 of the 6 spokes glowing orange
Teleporter with all 6 spokes glowing blue

subsections.description: This step and step 4 must be done within a single round

step.title: Important sound cues
step.description: At the start of each round, a sound will play to indicate a wisp has spawned. This is the same sound that plays after step 2. A buzzer will play if the step fails, and you will have to try again next round.

step.title: Wisp locations
step.description: There are 8 wisp locations around the map. When a wisp is active, it emits electricity. Shooting an inactive wisp will fail the step. An active wisp must be shot with an upgraded bow. After shooting an active wisp, it will vanish and a new wisp will spawn in (listen for the sound). One location will not be active twice in the same round.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the church, on the clock above the fireplace
Location 2 - in the church, on one of the devices across from Speed Cola
Location 3 - upstairs between the church and the clock tower, on a clock
Location 4 - in the power room, on a phone
Location 5 - in the bedrooms, on a globe
Location 6 - above Double Tap, on a box by the hole in the wall
Location 7 - between spawn and Double Tap, on a car tire
Location 8 - next to Quick Revive, on a phone

subsections.description: This must be done in the same round as the 3 wisps were shot. After teleporting to the past, there is a short timer to complete the step.

step.title: Use the teleporter in the Undercroft
step.description: When the wisp step is completed, the teleporter will glow purple, and a sound will be heard. All players must teleport together before the round ends.

step.title: Pick up fuses and glowing object in the room
step.description: Interact with the items to pick them up

pic.alt: Small fuses on a wooden box
Glowing object in the corner of the room

step.title: Remember the code on the safe
step.description: Dr. Groph will input 3 symbols on the safe. You must remember these symbols in the correct order for a later step.

pic.alt: The 3 symbols on the safe. There are 4 possible symbols that can be chosen.

subsections.header: 5. Set the Death Ray to Protect Mode
subsections.description: The Death Ray must be used at least once in the game before this step.

step.title: Place the fuses in the Death Ray

pic.alt: Location to place the fuses

step.title: Select the protect mode on the other side of the Death Ray

pic.alt: Death Ray on protect mode

subsections.header: 6. Enter the Safe Code on the Computers Outside the Clock Tower
subsections.description: If this step is failed, you must repeat the wisp step and time travel to get a new code

step.title: Interact with 1 symbol at a time. A click will be heard after each interaction. If done correctly, a sound will play.

pic.alt: The screens with the 4 possible symbols

subsections.header: 7. Move the Parts from the Safe to the Death Ray

step.title: Go to the safe in the teleporter room, and interact with the parts.

pic.alt: The unlocked safe with the parts inside

step.title: Place the parts in 2 places around the Death Ray

pic.alt: Location 1
Location 2

subsections.header: 8. Set the Death Ray Back to Destroy Mode

pic.alt: The Death Ray on destroy mode

subsections.description: Win a game of Samantha Says at both computer stations. If one fails, you must redo both games.

step.title: Interact with the computer station to start the game. Remember the order of the 4 symbols on the small screens, then click the correct screen after a symbol appears on the main screen.

pic.alt: Location 1 - outside the clock tower
Location 2 - at the rocket

step.title: When both games are complete, there will be white lights on each of the Death Ray towers.

pic.alt: One of the towers lit up white

subsections.description: Both Death Ray towers must be glowing from the previous step

step.title: Interact with the glowing green light on the back of the Death Ray
step.description: This will cause the Death Ray to shoot down the rocket. It will crash through the clock tower and land in the courtyard.

pic.alt: Glowing green button

step.title: Pick up the Vrill Device
step.description: Under the rocket wreckage in the courtyard, there is a small part to interact with

pic.alt: Vril Device in the snow

subsections.description: You can start the next step already, but this will need to be done before the next step can be finished.

step.title: Shoot 3 wisps again, and have all players teleport. Once again, this must be done in one round, and the teleporter will glow purple when ready.
In the past, you must interact with the Kronorium, then pick up the slab

pic.alt: Kronorium sitting on a box
Slab sitting in a small open safe

step.title: In the present, place the slab in the wall by Double Tap

pic.alt: Location to place the slab
Slab placed in wall

subsections.description: This can be done before finishing the previous step, but dogs will keep spawning in until the next step is completed. It is also recommended to have one bow upgraded per player before doing this step.

step.title: Place the Vril Device in the crypt next to the starter bow

pic.alt: Hole to place the Vril Device

step.title: Follow the Keeper ghost for the next step

subsections.header: 13. Get Kills in Each of the 4 Keeper Ghost Locations
subsections.description: The location by Double Tap requires the slab from the second time travel step, but the other locations can be done beforehand. One bow must be upgraded per player to complete this step.

step.title: Stand inside the white circle
step.description: The circle will grow in size for each player inside. You can step outside without kills resetting, but kills only count while you're inside the circle.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the courtyard
Location 2 - by Mule Kick
Location 3 - by Double Tap
Location 4 - in the power room

step.title: Kill zombies with the correct bow
step.description: Depending on the glow color while standing in the circle, zombies must be killed with a specific upgraded bow. Zombie souls will travel to the slab in the wall if killed with the correct bow.

pic.alt: Glow color for lightning bow
Glow color for wolf bow
Glow color for fire bow
Glow color for void bow

subsections.description: An audio scene will play before the M.P.D. teleports to the Undercroft.

pic.alt: Location to interact with

subsections.description: You cannot leave the boss fight until it's done. Make sure you have perks, a full shield, strong weapons, and any gobblegum you want to bring.

step.title: Teleport to the arena
step.description: All players must have fully charged Ragnaroks and stand on each of the 4 pressure plates. At the exact same time, all players must set the Ragnaroks onto the pressure plates.

pic.alt: One of the pressure plates next to the pyramid

step.title: Waves
step.description: There are a few waves that will repeat during the entire boss fight. During the storm wave, you can deal damage to the boss. If you successfully deal enough damage during the storm wave, you can beat the boss in 3 cycles. Skeletons and dogs will continue spawning the entire time, and do not need to be killed. Max ammo power-ups will sometimes spawn in the center of the arena.

step.title: Panzer Wave
step.description: When Panzers spawn in, you will have to kill all of them to advance to the next wave.

step.title: Boss Attacks
step.description: Some of the waves have different boss attacks. Flaming rock piles can spawn around the entire arena and will do damage if you step on them. Void skulls will fly through the air and deal damage.

step.title: Storm Wave
step.description: During the boss fight, a swirl of electricity will spawn in the center of the arena. If you fail to dodge the attack, you will be instantly downed. Hiding behind one of the pillars will prevent the lightning from damaging you, but you only have a few seconds to hide after the electricity spawns in.

pic.alt: Electricity from storm wave

step.title: Stunning the boss
step.description: You can only damage the boss during a storm wave. As soon as the elecricity appears, one player must place their Ragnaroks on the ground directly on the electricity in the center of the arena. If done correctly, the storm attack will be stopped, so you don't have to hide behind a pillar. This will also create a glowing symbol on the front of the boss.

step.title: Damaging the boss
step.description: While the glowing symbol is visible, all players should rapidly shoot it to deal as much damage as possible. Skeletons will continue to attack you during this time. If enough damage is dealt, the boss will be pushed back violently. If not enough damage is done in time, the boss will move away. In either case, the symbol will no longer be lit, and no damage can be done.

pic.alt: Glowing symbol on the Keeper boss

step.title: Killing the boss
step.description: After enough damage has been done, the boss will spin into the air, and everyone will teleport back to the Undercroft. It will always take 3 successful attacks to kill the boss. If not enough damage was dealt during one stun, the damage will carry over to the next stun, meaning it will take more than 3 stuns to finish all 3 attacks.

subsections.description: You can continue playing as normal after the cutscene is done.

step.title: Pick up the summoning key
step.description: Interact with the summoning key on the M.P.D. to pick it up.

pic.alt: Summoning key

step.title: Launch the nukes
step.description: Go to the terminal outside the clock tower and interact with the center computer.

pic.alt: Computer terminal

step.title: Cutscenes
step.description: Interacting with the computer will start an ingame cutscene. After that, all players will enter the video cutscene. All players will get the achievement, then the game will continue as normal.

subsections.description: Interact with 3 teddy bears.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the bedroom between Double Tap and the power room
Location 2 - across from Juggernog
Location 3 - in a truck by the rocket

subsections.description: Interact with 3 gramophones.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the bedroom between Double Tap and the power room
Location 2 - in the church
Location 3 - in the Undercroft

subsections.description: Wallrun on a blue pressure plate to attempt to trigger a rocket test launch. The first attempt will also spawn a Death Machine above the workbench by the pyramid.

pic.alt: Pressure plate location, near Pack-a-Punch and Juggernog

subsections.description: Kill 3 Panzers using Panzer Claws to grant all players the helmet. The map has 3 Panzer Claws that may each be used a single time. Shoot the claw once to make it fall down from the ceiling, then again to fire it forward (requires a bullet gun or knife melee). If the claw hits one or more Panzers, they are instantly killed.

pic.alt: Location 1 - on the catwalk across from the Double Tap dragon location
Location 2 - directly through the door by Quick Revive
Location 3 - in the power room, near the door that leads to the church

subsections.description: Pick up the flower pot in the teleporter room in the Undercroft. Then place it in the same spot while time traveling. Finally, interact with it in the present to get a random gobblegum.

pic.alt: Flower pot location
Flower pot back in time
Flower pot back in present

subsections.description: On the ceiling of the church, there are 3 spinning objects representing the Earth, Moon, and a rocket. Use explosives, such as a Ray Gun, on all 3 so they stop moving. If all 3 are stopped at the same time, the church will have a disco party.

pic.alt: Church disco party

subsections.description: Immediately after the game starts, throw 2 grenades into the left gondola before it moves away. The 5th Tram Fuse you spend in the game will move the left gondola instead of the right one. The reward will be much greater than the normal gondola.

pic.alt: Throwing grenades into the left gondola
PaP Haymaker reward in the left gondola

subsections.description: The plunger replaces the melee attack, but deals the same amount of damage as the base knife. The upgraded attack will 1-hit kill any enemy.

step.title: 1. Place Ragnaroks by clock gears
step.description: Shoot the fire bow symbol in the upper floor of the clock tower to reveal the gears. Then, place your Ragnaroks directly next to the gears.

pic.alt: Clock gears
Ragnaroks powering the clock

step.title: 2. Use the lever to set the clock to 9:35
step.description: Keep your Ragnaroks in the same position until the plunger is aquired. Even after the Ragnaroks run out of power, they will still allow the lever to be used. Interact with the lever to start and stop the clock from ticking, and move it from 1:15 to 9:35. The clock will tick louder every 12 ticks. The fastest you can interact with the lever on and off will normally advance the clock 2 ticks.

pic.alt: Control lever
Clock at 9:35

step.title: 3. Time travel
step.description: Once the clock is successfully stopped at exactly 9:35, a sound will play, and the clock will tick forward once. Go to the Undercroft, and there should be a blue orb above the pyramid, indicating the step worked. Then, wallrun over the blue symbol until you are sent to the past.

pic.alt: Orb above pyramid
Symbol to wallrun on

step.title: 4. Aquire the plunger
step.description: You have a short time to pick up the plunger from the desk. Once aquired, it will permanently replace your melee attack. In order to time travel again, you must set the clock back to 9:35.

pic.alt: Plunger sitting on desk
Plunger melee attack

step.title: 5. Upgrade the plunger
step.description: Every time you kill a Panzer with any weapon, the plunger will become upgraded for a short amount of time. While upgraded, it will 1-hit kill all enemies.

pic.alt: Upgraded plunger attack

subsections.description: Using a bow, shoot 3 floating skulls while using the In Plain Sight gobblegum. The skulls are only visible while the gobblegum is active.

pic.alt: Location 1 - next to Double Tap
Location 2 - behind Mule Kick
Location 3 - outside the church, on the balcony

subsections.description: There are 5 blue pressure plates on the walls of the Undercroft. Wallrun over all 5 of them to create a BRM wall-buy above the workbench and to the left.

pic.alt: One of the pressure plates on the wall
BRM wall-buy

subsections.description: Interact with the music box in the bedroom across from the teddy location. Samantha's Lullaby will be audible near the music box.

pic.alt: Music box location

subsections.description: This cannot be done if you start the game with the RK5 after completing the super easter egg. Playing an offline local game will allow you to play as normal with only the MR6.

step.title: 1. Destroy barriers on round 2
step.description: After the game starts, allow the zombies to break down all the barriers. Advance to round 2 and stay on round 2 for the rest of the steps.

step.title: 2. Repair with MR6
step.description: Don't buy any weapons yet. For each of the 5 barriers, repair exactly 2 boards.

pic.alt: Barrier with 2 boards

step.title: 3. Repair with RK5
step.description: Buy the RK5, then repair 2 more boards on each barrier.

pic.alt: Barrier with 4 boards

step.title: 4. Repair with Sheiva
step.description: Trade out your RK5 for the Sheiva, then repair 1 more board on each barrier.

pic.alt: Barrier with 5 boards

step.title: 5. RK5 and door
step.description: Trade out your Sheiva for the RK5 again, then quickly open the door on the bottom floor. There will be a dev's family photo outside the map.

pic.alt: Family photo in a heart frame

subsections.description: The raven above Mule Kick can be shot and killed.

pic.alt: The raven
